clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the kitchen pot to remove any dirt or food particles.

remove_lid.description: Remove the lid from the pot.

place_lid.description: Place the lid on the pot.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider of the kitchen pot to ensure smooth operation.

adjust_slider.description: Slide in the slider of the kitchen pot to adjust the pot size.

reset_slider.description: Slide out the slider of the kitchen pot to restore the pot to maximum size.

pick_pot.description: Pick up the pot for relocation or for pouring out the contents.

place_pot.description: Place the pot at a specific location after cleaning or relocation.

clean_pot.description: Clean the entire pot including the pot body, slider and lid.

press_lid_and_slider.description: Press both the lid and the slider.

clean_whole_pot.description: Clean the entire pot including the pot body, lid, and slider.

assemble_pot.description: Assemble the kitchen pot after cleaning or dismantling. Includes placing the slider, placing the lid on the pot body.

disassemble_pot.description: Disassemble the kitchen pot for deep cleaning or storage. Includes removing the slider, removing the lid from the pot body.
